Class DataAnalysis

java.lang.Object
DataAnalysis
public abstract class DataAnalysis extends Object
This class calculates several metrics based off of the reservations and cancellations csv files This class is abstract and all the methods are static since instances are not needed to calculate the various metrics.
Since:
27/10/2021
Author:
Edison Cai 20241135

  • Method Details

    • getOccupancyRatesAll

      public static ArrayList<String> getOccupancyRatesAll(ArrayList<Reservation> reservations, LocalDate startDate, LocalDate endDate, boolean showUnoccupiedRooms)
      Returns the occupancy figures for each hotel and room type over a specific period of time.
      Parameters:
      reservations - List of reservations
      startDate - The start date of analysis
      endDate - The end date of analysis
      showUnoccupiedRooms - Choose if you want to display rooms that haven't been booked
      Returns:
      The occupancy rates of every hotel and room in the form of a list of Strings.

    • calculateIncomeAll

      public static ArrayList<String> calculateIncomeAll(ArrayList<Reservation> reservations, ArrayList<Cancellation> cancellations, LocalDate startDate, LocalDate endDate, boolean showUnoccupiedRooms)
      Returns the income figures for each hotel and room type over a specific period of time.
      Parameters:
      reservations - A list of all reservations
      cancellations - A list of all cancellations
      startDate - The start date of analysis
      endDate - The end date of analysis
      showUnoccupiedRooms - Choose if you want to display rooms that haven't been booked
      Returns:
      The income of every hotel and room in the form of a list of Strings.
